item.title: Frisky Mermaid Public Dolphin + Sightseeing Cruise Up to 49 Pax
item.description: There are dolphin tours and then there’s the Frisky Mermaid: a boat tour that tempts you with a mer-mazing time on the water. Come aboard this boat for a scenic cruise around Pensacola Beach, either in the morning or evening. Depending on which time you choose, you may be able to see a variety of marine life in the waters such as fish, turtles, and dolphins. No matter when you sail, the Gulf breeze and warm sun accompany you.

image.alt: Frisky Mermaid Public Dolphin + Sightseeing Cruise Up to 49 Pax

item.title: Pensacola Beach Jolly Dolphin Cruise and Scenic Bay Tour
item.description: Hop aboard the Jolly Dolphin, a 42-foot (12.8-meter) shaded tritoon, and make your way out to sea with a captain and crew to help make your experience enjoyable and educational. As you glide along the waters, you'll learn about the natural environment and the creatures that call it home. You may even spot dolphins frolicking in the surf.

image.alt: Pensacola Beach Jolly Dolphin Cruise and Scenic Bay Tour

item.title: Hop-on Hop-off Tour in Pensacola
item.description: Explore downtown Pensacola without getting lost on this hop-on hop-off bus tour—a great choice for first-time visitors. Take as much time as you like at each stop and sightsee at your own pace. Your pass includes a guided tour of Pensacola’s oldest house and a self-guided tour of the old cemetery. Plus, enjoy commentary from your guide and over $100 worth of discounts at businesses and attractions along the route.

image.alt: Hop-on Hop-off Tour in Pensacola

item.title: Frisky Mermaid Pontoon Boat Rentals in Pensacola Beach
item.description: Captain your own private pontoon in Pensacola with this boat rental service. Choose a rental length of time that suits your schedule from one day to seven days, then explore at your leisure. Go cruising to check out marine life, get in the water for snorkeling, and dock at local restaurants. Recommendations are provided for fishing, picnics, where to keep an eye out for dolphins, and more.

image.alt: Frisky Mermaid Pontoon Boat Rentals in Pensacola Beach

item.title: Ghosts and Graveyard Tour of Pensacola
item.description: Discover some of Pensacola’s deepest, darkest secrets on a guided, ghost-themed bus tour. This “frightseeing” tour explores the darker side of this waterfront city, one of the earliest European settlements in the US. Discover the five types of hauntings that are common in Pensacola. Visit the historic downtown district, plus the Seville Quarter, Sanders Beach, North Hill, and a cemetery, of course. This scary, fun and informative adventure is for mature audiences. Parental discretion is advised.

image.alt: Ghosts and Graveyard Tour of Pensacola

item.title: Night Glow Kayak Paddle Session in Pensacola Beach
item.description: Whether you’re paddling alone or with a partner, this nighttime paddling session includes a kayak that can accommodate two people. It’s a clear, transparent vessel that’s illuminated with LED solar lights to give you a glimpse into the waters below. Choose your favorite color, slide on a life jacket, and paddle across the Pensacola Beach Sabine while looking for fish, stingrays, and dolphins.

image.alt: Night Glow Kayak Paddle Session in Pensacola Beach

item.title: Seville Quarter Haunted Ghost Tour, Investigation, and Luncheon
item.description: Pensacola’s Seville Quarter restaurant is one of the city’s most haunted locations. Sit down to lunch and learn about the establishment’s eerie past from your ghost-hunting guide. Ghost hunting equipment is provided, or you can bring your own, to help identify paranormal spirits that may try to join your lunch.

image.alt: Seville Quarter Haunted Ghost Tour, Investigation, and Luncheon

item.title: Frisky Mermaid Dolphin + Scenic Bay Sightseeing Tour
item.description: Explore Pensacola Bay by boat with this private, scenic tour focused on local wildlife including dolphins. Climb aboard a boat and set out to see the Gulf Island National Seashore. Cool off with a swim and snorkel if you choose. Keep an eye out for dolphins and other marine life throughout the tour. The itinerary can be customized and you’re welcome to bring a personal cooler on board.

image.alt: Frisky Mermaid Dolphin + Scenic Bay Sightseeing Tour

item.title: Seville Savories Palafox Trot Tour
item.description: The Panhandle of Florida is known for serving up delicious grub and its city of Pensacola is no exception. Join a local guide for an eclectic dining experience through the streets of Pensacola’s historic downtown. You’ll sample dishes from the city’s locally-owned establishments, visiting both cooks serving up street food to nationally-recognized chefs preparing elegant dishes. From seafood and tacos to Asian fusion and more, get ready for a tasty tour of Pensacola’s delicious restaurants.

image.alt: Seville Savories Palafox Trot Tour

item.title: Seville Stroll Food Tour
item.description: Come hungry to Pensacola’s Historic District and leave having learnt about the city’s history and cuisine. This Seville Stroll food tour is a great way to sample the tastes that North Florida has to offer. Follow your guide (and your taste buds) around this historic area, learning about the many diverse cultures that influenced the cuisine, including the Spanish, French, English, and Native American.

image.alt: Seville Stroll Food Tour

item.title: 2hr Segway Tour of Downtown
item.description: Join this small-group Segway tour to explore downtown Pensacola with a guide and an intimate group. Listen to commentary from your guide and ask all the questions you like. You cover quite a bit of ground on your Segway–much more than you could on a walking tour. Stop for photos as you go to show your friends back home.

image.alt: 2hr Segway Tour of Downtown

item.title: Private 3 Hour Powerboat Dolphin Cruise with Remote Beach Stop up to 6 guests
item.description: Receive personalized attention on a private powerboat tour of the Pensacola area. With your group of up to six passengers you’ll tour Pensacola Bay, the Pensacola Pass, and Big Lagoon in a comfortable vessel, the Jolly'Ventures. Stop at a remote beach where you can enjoy the peace and quiet, away from the crowds. A fun half-day excursion for the whole family.

image.alt: Private 3 Hour Powerboat Dolphin Cruise with Remote Beach Stop up to 6 guests

item.title: Walking Pub Tour
item.description: Don’t discover Pensacola flavor with a generic walking tour or generic pub tour—combine both worlds with a walking pub tour. With your guide leading the way, you’ll bar-hop across five different spots within historic downtown Pensacola. As you do, you’ll nab discounts, hear wild tales of the city, and taste Pensacola’s best brews.

image.alt: Walking Pub Tour

item.title: 1hr Segway Tour Downtown
item.description: This Downtown Pensacola Segway Tour is perfect for travelers who are short on time, but who still want to see the city. A guide takes you on a segway, so you don’t have to get tired from walking around and tells you about the city as you see places such as the Old Christ Church, Plaza De Luna Memorial Monument, and Plaza Ferdinand VII.

image.alt: 1hr Segway Tour Downtown

item.title: 3 hours cruise with swimming
item.description: Pensacola Beach is beautiful, Little Sabine Lake and Santa Rosa sound are stunning and hard to pass by without getting on the most unique vessel in the area. Our tiki was built for one purpose, and that was to make lasting one of kind a memories while enjoying the incredible back drop that is this area. Float and swim on the Little Sabine Lake, or hangout in the water around the tiki just off the bayside beach at Flounders Bar & Restaurant or the Sneaky Tiki Bar. Bring your own Beverages & Snacks and/or Get food and drinks at the Great bars along the route.

image.alt: 3 hours cruise with swimming

item.title: 2 Hour Private Dolphin Cruise & Bay Tour
item.description: Keep your eyes peeled for jumping dolphins on this private cruise and bay tour in Pensacola. Your captain takes care of navigating, so you can relax and search for wildlife. Besides the dolphins, pass the Pensacola Lighthouse and Maritime Museum, and the Fort Pickens Area, where you can take some photos and learn about Pensacola history.

image.alt: 2 Hour Private Dolphin Cruise & Bay Tour

item.title: Sunset Cruise Tour
item.description: There’s nothing quite like watching the sunset from the Florida Panhandle, especially when you’re out on the emerald waters fed from the Gulf of Mexico. Take advantage of the wide open water and enjoy a relaxing sunset cruise leaving Pensacola Beach. A licensed USCG Captain will take you through Little Sabine Lake and the Santa Rosa Sound where you’ll watch the sun fade into the horizon.

image.alt: Sunset Cruise Tour

item.title: Night Glow Kayak Paddle Session in Navarre Beach
item.description: Explore the waters off Navarre Beach in the quiet evening hours when most boats have moored for the night with this nighttime kayak rental. Paddle by moonlight as the multi-colored lights in your transparent kayak illuminate the underwater world; with luck, you may spot local marine life below the surface as you glide past. Admire the twinkling lights along the coastline from the water before heading back to your starting point.

image.alt: Night Glow Kayak Paddle Session in Navarre Beach

item.title: Learn to Surf - Navarre Beach
item.description: The beaches of the Gulf of Mexico are a great place to learn to surf. Join a small group on Navarre Beach and take to the waters for your very first surfing lesson. Learn about water safety, paddling techniques, and proper stances on the sand before jumping in the water for your first waves. Your instructor is in the water with you to assist you with technique and line-up placement.

image.alt: Learn to Surf - Navarre Beach

item.title: Haunted Pensacola Walking Tour
item.description:
Join us on a thrilling journey through Pensacola's haunted past with our entertaining walking ghost tour. Led by experienced local tour guides, you'll explore multiple haunted and historic locations. Discover the chilling tales of tortured prisoners, Victorian murders, and deadly diseases that have left their mark on Flag City. As you walk along the haunted streets, you'll uncover the casualties of the past and witness the lingering spirits that still roam the area.
Our tours begin at 8 PM and cover a mile of haunted and historic Pensacola real estate. You'll have the opportunity to see and hear stories about iconic places such as the Saenger Theatre, Baptist Medical Group, and Seville Quarter. Join us for a unique and exciting look at the dark, spooky side of Pensacola!

image.alt: Haunted Pensacola Walking Tour

item.title: Learn to Surf - Pensacola Beach
item.description: Get your sea legs on and learn to surf during your time in Pensacola Beach. Join a small group and enjoy a surfing lesson right that begins right on the beach. Learn about water safety, techniques, and ocean etiquette from your instructor. Then, it's time to take to the waves to put your newfound skills to the test while your instructor guides you from the water.

image.alt: Learn to Surf - Pensacola Beach

item.title: Private 3 Hour Sunset Cruise On A 50' Luxury Yacht With Captain
item.description:
- This is a private cruise on a yacht with a USCG licensed Captain. - We have 2 restrooms and an air conditioned cabin with a flat screen TV.
Avoid overcrowded excursions with this private, small-group (up to 6 passengers), sunset cruise on Pensacola Bay and the intracoastal waterway to include: viewing the Pensacola Pass, the Pensacola Lighthouse on NAS, Home of the Blue Angels, Sand Island and the Big Lagoon. As we head out from Bayou Grande in the late afternoon aboard our 50' yacht, your Captain shares details about the area's waterways. As we sail away from the shore and enjoy our local waters, you will take in all that our coastline has to offer. While sipping on a cold drink, we will chase the sunset and look out for dolphins playing in the wake before heading back in— it’s the perfect way to end your day and to make memories that will last a lifetime.

image.alt: Private 3 Hour Sunset Cruise On A 50' Luxury Yacht With Captain

item.title: Frisky Mermaid Dolphin Tour + Secluded Beach + Equip
item.description: Ready for a mermazing adventure? You'll enjoy this open air vessel while cruising the bay searching for dolphins and other marine and wildlife with our USCG Captain. This Frisky Stop includes beaching at a secluded beach for swimming, shelling and fun. See local historical sites while learning about our beautiful area and our amazing sea life. EVERY PERSON counts, including INFANTS.

image.alt: Frisky Mermaid Dolphin Tour + Secluded Beach + Equip

item.title: Glass Paddle Pensacola Beach
item.description: Take your kayaking experience to a new level by hopping into a fully transparent glass kayak. As clear as the Gulf Breeze waters you’ll paddle down, these kayaks seat two people and are a great way to see maximum marine life when out in the Gulf. This low-impact activity is a fun activity for adults and children, offered in both daytime and evening sessions so you can beat the heat.

image.alt: Glass Paddle Pensacola Beach
